attributes.additional_details: This is doing more harm than good, yes it will help people with obesity but they potentially don’t take the calories into consideration when choosing their meal, it’s causing more harm to people with eating disorders, causing them to be scared of certain meals and not having what they actually would like
attributes.background: Remove calories off menus, help people who struggle with eating disorders

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/647503
